description: This source file defines the InvoiceItem entity class for an invoice system, including its fields, relationships, and a method to recalculate the line total.

classes.name: InvoiceItem
classes.description: Entity class representing a line item in an invoice with fields for item details, quantity, price, totals, and timestamps.

methods.name: recalcLineTotal
methods.description: Recalculates the total price for this invoice item by multiplying unit price and quantity.
